thread.title: Nigeria: Osinbajo Commissions Dangote Cement Plant in Zambia
thread.title_full: Nigeria: Osinbajo Commissions Dangote Cement Plant in Zambia

title: Nigeria: Osinbajo Commissions Dangote Cement Plant in Zambia
text:
Nigeria: We've Identified Countries Holding Stolen Money - Buhari By George Agba 
Vice President Yemi Osinbajo, who is in Zambia on a one-day official visit, is expected to commission a 1.5 million tonnes Dangote Cement Plant and 30 megawatts (mw) coal-fired power plant in Ndola today. 
A statement by his media aide, Mr Laolu Akande, noted that, during the trip, Osinbajo "will meet with the Zambian president, Mr Edgar Chagwa Lungu, and also pay a courtesy visit to the vice president, Inonge Wina. 
"Prof Osinbajo will be participating tomorrow in the commissioning of the 1.5 million tonnes Dangote Cement Plant and 30 megawatts coal-fired power plant in Ndola, Zambia," Akande said. 
He said the vice president will return to Abuja later in the day. Nigeria
